you can already copy the files quietly, just copy the folder DATA of zeronet and paste in the other pc that has the zeronet or extracts a new application of zeronet in this new pc and then paste inside the folder of the new application is folder data that you copied , you can copy even files, videos and etc, specific if you know the place where it was in your pc and create and paste in the same places, will work as well.
